result.reason: Feature request to expose RDP multi-monitor support (UseMultimon property) already available in the MSTSCLib ActiveX control but not yet surfaced in mRemoteNG's UI or connection settings.
result.approach: Expose the IMsRdpClientNonScriptable5.UseMultimon property by adding a UseMultimon boolean to ConnectionInfo, wiring it in the RDP protocol setup code, and adding a checkbox in the RDP connection properties UI panel.
